discription: Ophthalmologist is a specialist in medical and surgical eye problems. Since ophthalmologists perform operations on eyes, they are both surgical and medical specialists.
Cataract surgery is the removal of the natural lens of the eye that has developed an opacification, which is referred toas a cataract.
Pediatric ophthalmology is a sub-speciality of ophthalmology concerned with eye diseases, visual development, and vision care in children.
The cornea is a clear layer that covers the front of the eye. It helps the eye focus, and keeps out germs and dust. This is a diseases of the cornea.
Glaucoma is a group of eye diseases which result in damage to the optic nerve and vision loss. The most common type is open-angle glaucoma with less common types.
Diabetic retinopathy, also known as diabetic eye disease, is when damage occurs to the retina due to diabetes. It can eventually lead to blindness.
